IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE IDAHO EDUCATION ASSOCIATION ADVOCATES FOR THE PROFESSIONAL AND PERSONAL WELL-BEING OF ITS MEMBERS AND THE VISION OF EXCELLENCE IN THE PUBLIC EDUCATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE IDAHO EDUCATION ASSOCIATION ADVOCATES FOR THE PROFESSIONAL AND PERSONAL WELL-BEING OF ITS MEMBERS AND THE VISION OF EXCELLENCE IN PUBLIC EDUCATION.
IRS990.Desc: IDAHO EDUCATION ASSOCIATION PROVIDES ITS MEMBERS WITH PROFESSIONAL TRAINING, LEGAL SERVICES, GROUP LIABILITY INSURANCE, COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AND VARIOUS POLICY SERVICES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: IDAHO EDUCATION ASSOCIATION RAISES AWARENESS ON ISSUES IMPACTING IDAHO'S PUBLIC EDUCATION SYSTEM AND ITS EDUCATORS THROUGH GOVERNMENTAL DEVELOPMENT FOR EDUCATORS AND PUBLIC RELATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IEA, THROUGH IT'S POLITICAL ACTION COMMITTEE (PACE) SOLICITS CONTRIBUTIONS FROM IEA MEMBERS ONLY AND USES THOSE FUNDS TO MAKE POLITICAL CONTRIBUTIONS TO STATE AND LOCAL CANDIDATES. IEA'S GOVERNMENT RELATIONS COMMITTEE ALSO ORGANIZES IEA MEMBERS IN GRASSROOTS LOBBYING AND REFERENDUM ACTIVITIES OF THE IDAHO LEGISLATURE WHEN IN SESSION.

THE ASSOCIATION IS A NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(5) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE PACE IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 527 OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISIONS FOR INCOME TAX IS MADE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE ASSOCIATION'S TAX POSITIONS AND CONCLUDED THAT THE ASSOCAITION HAD TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: ANNUAL $25,000 MEMBERSHIP PAYMENT TO THE IDAHO INVESTOR NETWORK TO SUPPORT OF OPERATIONS OF THIS ENTITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IDAHO EDUCATION ASSOCIATION (IEA) GIVES GRANTS TO LOCAL PAC ENTITIES. IEA GETS REGULAR REPORTS, LETTERS, EMAILS AND OTHER CORRESPONDENCE TO MONITOR THE UTILIZATION OF ALL FUNDS GRANTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IEA IS A MEMBER ORGANIZATION, WHERE IT'S MEMBERS ELECT OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS OF THE GOVERNING BODY, AS WELL AS DELEGATES TO DELEGATE ASSEMBLY. DELEGATES RATIFY BYLAW CHANGES AND THE OTHER SIGNIFICANT DECISIONS OF THE GOVERNING BODY (EG. ANNUAL BUDGET).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH OF IEA'S 9 REGIONS ELECTS REPRESENTATIVES TO SERVE ON IEA'S BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS APPROVE CHANGES TO BYLAWS AND THE ANNUAL BUDGET.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 10B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH LOCAL ASSOCIATION IS AUTONOMOUS. IEA OFFERS TRAINING AND SERVICES TO LOCALS, BUT DOES NOT GOVERN THEM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IEA FORM 990 IS PRESENTED TO THE BUDGET COMMITTEE (WHOSE MEMBERS ALSO SERVE ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS) AT THE NOVEMBER MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BUDGET COMMITTEE MONITORS CONFLICT OF INTEREST TRANSACTIONS AND RELATIONSHIPS, AS WELL AS THE BUSINESS OFFICE, WHO APPROVES THE NEW VENDOR SETUP, PAYMENTS AND CONTRACTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IEA'S BOARD APPROVES AND SETS EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS SALARY. IEA PRESIDENT IS ELECTED BY A REFERENDUM VOTE BY RETIRED AND ACTIVE MEMBERS EVERY THREE YEARS. APPLICANTS FOR OTHER MANAGEMENT POSITIONS (ASSOCIATE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, LEGAL COUNSEL AND DIRECTOR OF BUSINESS AND FINANCE) ARE SCREENED BY A SEARCH COMMITTEE INCLUDING MEMBERS AND STAFF, WITH THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR MAKING THE FINAL DECISION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ONLY AVAILABLE TO IEA MEMBERS, MANAGEMENT AND STAFF.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: PROVIDES CHARITABLE ASSISTANCE TO IDAHO SCHOOL-AGE CHILDREN
ADVOCATE FOR EDUCATION PROFESSIONALS AND PREPARE EVERY STUDENT TO SUCCEED.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE CENTER FOR TEACHING AND LEARNING

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO PROTECT, DEFEND, AND PROMOTE THE PUBLIC EDUCATION PROFESSION
